import Layout from "../components/Layout"; import { Row, Col, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { GoogleMap, LoadScript } from "@react-google-maps/api"; import Icon from 'react-icons/fa'; function Iletisim() { const {FaBeer} = Icon const mapStyles = { height: "80vh", width: "100%", }; const defaultCenter = { lat: 41.0851, lng: 28.8734, }; return (
